summary: Job-finding app that aggregates listings from multiple online job portals, with an admin panel and AdSense-ready monetization.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Minimalist wordmark logo reading “Mogambo” with a bold, modern look (mogambo-logo.dim_512x192.png)
- Simple icon-style favicon mark for “Mogambo” (mogambo-favicon.dim_128x128.png)
- Wide, subtle background/hero illustration with abstract shapes and warm tones (mogambo-hero-bg.dim_1600x900.png)

existing_features.title: Set the application name to “Mogambo” across the UI (header/title text) and any app metadata that is user-visible.

Implement job search and discovery by aggregating listings from multiple configurable job portal sources: provide a unified search UI (keyword + location + optional filters) and a results list that normalizes common fields (title, company, location, source, date, apply URL).

Create an Admin Panel that is accessible only to authenticated admin users and allows managing job sources (create/update/enable/disable/delete) and basic app settings relevant to aggregation and ads.
Implement authentication using Internet Identity and backend authorization for admin-only operations (admin list stored in backend; only admins can mutate sources/settings).

Make the frontend AdSense-ready by adding clearly defined ad slots (e.g., header/banner and sidebar/in-feed placements) that can be toggled on/off via admin settings, and ensure the integration is implemented as a safe, optional script/embed with graceful fallback when ads are disabled or blocked.

Create a coherent, distinctive visual theme for Mogambo (colors, typography, layout, spacing) and apply it consistently across landing/search/results and the Admin Panel (avoid blue/purple as primary colors).
Add static generated brand assets and wire them into the UI: include a logo and favicon for Mogambo, and use them in the header and browser tab.

new_feature_requests.summary: Aggregate job listings from multiple online job portals for job search and discovery
Add an admin panel to manage the app (e.g., content, sources, users/settings)
Make the app AdSense-ready (ads integration/placement support)

Add backend support for managing job portal sources, including: storing a list of sources (name, base URL, fetch type such as JSON/RSS, enabled flag), fetching jobs from enabled sources via HTTPS outcalls where possible, and exposing query methods for the frontend to search across fetched results.
